options.name: style
options.label: Style
options.tooltip: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

options.name: inlineStyle
options.label: Inline Style
options.tooltip: When true, includes styles inline in the component TS file. By default, an external styles file is created and referenced in the component TS file.

options.name: inlineTemplate
options.label: Inline Template
options.tooltip: When true, includes template inline in the component TS file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component TS file.

options.name: manager
options.label: Package Manager
options.tooltip: The package manager used to install dependencies.

options.name: minimal
options.label: Minimal
options.tooltip: When true, creates a workspace without any testing frameworks. (Use for learning purposes only.)

options.name: routing
options.label: Routing
options.tooltip: When true, generates a routing module for the initial project.

options.name: legacyBrowsers
options.label: Legacy Browsers
options.tooltip: Add support for legacy browsers like Internet Explorer using differential loading.
